zh.description: 当前宿主（消费者）版本，可以在 __FEDERATION__.moduleInfo 中根据 `hostName:hostVersion` 的 key 获取对应的模块信息

en.description: The current host (consumer) version, you can get the corresponding module information in __FEDERATION__.moduleInfo according to the key of `hostName:hostVersion`

zh.description: 生产者全局挂载名称，其值为插件配置中的 name 字段。

en.description: remote global mount name, which value is the same as the name in build configuration.

zh.description: Module Federation 依赖快照，里面记录了当前 MF 完整的依赖关系，可以通过在控制台输入 __FEDERATION__.moduleInfo 查看。

en.description: Module Federation dependency snapshot, which records the complete dependencies of the current MF, can be viewed by entering __FEDERATION__.moduleInfo in the console.

zh.description: 请求生产者的 path ，在导入模块时使用，例如： import Remote from requestId / loadRemote(requestId)

en.description: The path of the request producer, used when importing the module, for example: import Remote from requestId / loadRemote(requestId)

zh.description: manifest 请求地址，当设置了 remote entry 为 mf-manifest.json 时，会请求此资源

en.description: Manifest request address. When the remote entry is set to mf-manifest.json, this resource will be requested.
